title: Lee sin pick rate will rise to unseen levels due to new GoD skin
body: Its funny how the forums were complaining about lee last week. Just wait till next patch...{{champion:64}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:64}}

replies.body:
*Reads title*

Well, Lee Sin won't see it, that is certain.

Well actually, he will. Cause the new skin lets him see and all. Guess that joke is going to fall apart now....
